# Application Control Engine (ACE)

## Key facts

* MSG Format based filter
* None conformant legacy BSD Format default port 514

## Links
| Ref            | Link                                                                                                    |
|----------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Splunk Add-on  | None                                                               |

| cisco:ace      | None                                                                                                    |
